Alan and all,
Another option is a book I use which is Kano Natsuo Meihin Sh=
u by Ikeda.  It's a single volume published in 1972.  It covers his tsuba, =
kodogu, some paintings, non-sword metal work, etc.  Even a photo or two of =
Natsuo himself.

Jim



  Matt, Jim,
  There was an 8 volume Natsuo set in =
last June's sale at Christie's estimated
  at =A31000-1500, it didn't sell.=
 It is basically text with the illustrations
  spread throughout the set, t=
here was however a single volume of all the
  illustrations published separ=
ately, this is the one to get if you can find
  it.
  Alan
